author: bainbrid
body:
**UPDATED**:

This PR adds two weights files, on the V01-01-XX branch for the 10_6_X release cycle:
- `LowPtElectrons_ID_2020Nov28.root`
- `LowPtElectrons_ID_2021May17.root`

in addition to the existing `LowPtElectrons_ID_2020Sept15.root` weights file, as required by the PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/33589

The 2020Sept15 file is already in use by the run2_miniAOD_UL modifier for the ongoing UL re-miniAOD campaign. 

The 2020Nov28 is enabled by the run2_miniAOD_devel modifier, to used during any future UL re-MINIAOD campaign for "standard" CMS data sets. 

The 2021May17 file is enabled by the bParking modifier, to used during the UL RE-RECO of the BParking data set.

The model performances can be found in [this](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1034467/contributions/4344267/attachments/2248230/3813485/LowPtElectrons_PPDMay21.pdf) presentation.
title: LowPtElectrons: 2020Nov28 and 2021May17 models for 10_6_X
